hero.description: At Lytu, we merge high-level software engineering with intuitive design. We don't just write code; we forge digital experiences that drive businesses.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a team of passionate developers dedicated to creating exceptional digital experiences.
about.missionText: Transform businesses through innovative technology solutions.
about.visionText: Be leaders in digital innovation in Latin America.

services.title: Comprehensive Digital Engineering
services.subtitle: From conceptual idea to final deployment. We cover the entire lifecycle of modern software development.

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: Ultra-fast, scalable, and SEO-optimized websites and progressive web apps (PWA). We use modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.

aiAutomations.title: AI Automations
aiAutomations.description: We optimize your business processes with artificial intelligence and smart automation. Advanced chatbots, document processing, and predictive analytics.

mobileDev.title: Mobile Apps
mobileDev.description: Native and hybrid development for iOS and Android. We create smooth experiences that your users will love to carry in their pocket.

customSoftware.title: Custom Software
customSoftware.description: Management systems, analytical dashboards, and internal tools designed specifically to solve your company's unique problems.

design.title: Design & Branding
design.description: Complete visual identity: logos, color palettes, typography and graphic assets. We create your brand image from scratch to make it stand out.

philosophy.subtitle: A young and professional team that applies modern processes and focuses on real metrics. We deliver clear, maintainable, and results-oriented products so your business moves forward with confidence.

teamCard.name: Lytu â€” Team
teamCard.quote: We accelerate deliveries with modern practices and direct communication. We work with you to prioritize what really adds value.

process.title: How we work
process.subtitle: Clear and collaborative process to reduce friction and accelerate results.

step2.title: Build
step2.description: Iterative MVPs to validate hypotheses quickly.

step3.title: Scale
step3.description: Evolution based on data and real feedback.

readySolutions.title: Technology ready to
readySolutions.subtitle: Leverage our pre-built modules to reduce time and costs. We adapt them 100% to your workflow and brand.

customCTA.title: Didn't find what you're looking for?
customCTA.description: We create custom solutions for your business. Tell us what you need and we'll build it for you.

booking.title: Booking System
booking.description: Complete scheduling engine with availability management, automatic notifications and calendar synchronization.

aiChatbot.title: AI Chatbot
aiChatbot.description: 24/7 intelligent assistant trained with your business data. Answers questions, qualifies leads, and automates customer support naturally.

quotes.title: Quote System
quotes.description: Dynamic PDF budget generation, tax calculation and status tracking to close more sales.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: High-performance online stores. Shopping cart, integrated payment gateways, order management and admin panel.

crm.title: CRM
crm.description: Centralized customer management. Lead tracking, interaction history and visual sales pipeline.

inventory.title: Inventory System
inventory.description: Real-time stock control. Warehouse management, low stock alerts, movements and valuation reports.

blog.title: Blogs & Content
blog.description: SEO-optimized CMS. Publish articles, news and updates with an intuitive editor and friendly structure.

portfolio.title: Our Work
portfolio.subtitle: Projects we are developing and cases we have already launched.

tuviaje.title: TuViaje
tuviaje.description: Mobile application for travelers. Itinerary management, reservations and local recommendations in one app.

novacorp.title: Nova Corp
novacorp.description: Financial management platform for companies. Intuitive dashboard with data analysis and automated reports.

imago.title: Imago Creations
imago.description: Platform to request and customize corporate clothing. Intuitive design, order management and real-time tracking.

baila.title: Baila Conmigo
baila.description: Modern website for dance academy. Class calendar, event gallery and online registration system.

contact.title: Do you have an ambitious idea?
contact.subtitle: We are the technical team you need to make it a reality. No intermediaries, no bureaucracy, just excellent code.
contact.projectPlaceholder: Tell us briefly what you want to build...

simpleOption.title: Quick Contact
simpleOption.description: For general inquiries, questions, or greetings. We will respond shortly.

quoteOption.title: I know what I want
quoteOption.description: Request a detailed quote for your project. Tell us your specific requirements.
